.. py:data:: custom_bw2_dir

   

.. py:data:: db_wmf_name
   :value: 'WasteAndMaterialFootprint'

   

.. py:data:: delete_wmf_project
   :value: False

   

.. py:data:: dir_logs

   

.. py:data:: dir_tmp

   

.. py:function:: generate_args_list(single_database=None)

   Generate a list of argument dictionaries for processing multiple projects and databases.

   This function is used when the tool is set to operate in multiple projects/databases mode.
   It generates a list of argument dictionaries, each containing project and database settings.

   :returns: A list of dictionaries with project and database settings for batch processing.


.. py:data:: project_base

   

.. py:data:: project_premise
   :value: 'SSP-cutoff'

   

.. py:data:: project_wmf

   

.. py:data:: use_multiprocessing
   :value: False

   

.. py:data:: use_premise
   :value: False

   

.. py:data:: use_wmf
   :value: True

   

.. py:data:: do_search
   :value: True

   

.. py:data:: do_methods
   :value: True

   

.. py:data:: do_edit
   :value: True

   

.. py:data:: single_database
   :value: 'ecoinvent_cutoff_3.9_remind_SSP5-Base_2050'

   

.. py:data:: queries_waste

   

.. py:data:: queries_materials
